entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH, Ear Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:03 p.m. EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 15.
